validationRules.block_id: Required - unique identifier for the accordion block
validationRules.toggleIcon: Boolean - when true, requires iconName and ActiconName
validationRules.iconName: Required when toggleIcon is true - closed state icon (e.g., 'fas fa-plus')
validationRules.ActiconName: Required when toggleIcon is true - open state icon (e.g., 'fas fa-minus')
validationRules.defaultAct: String - index of default active accordion (e.g., '0' for first item, '' for none)
validationRules.atOneOpen: Boolean - when true, only one accordion can be open at a time
validationRules.expCollBtn: When true, requires expandText and collapseText
validationRules.markupSch: When true, requires howTotitle and howTodesc for valid How-To schema
validationRules.innerBlocks: Array of tp-accordion-inner child blocks - minimum 1 item required
validationRules.onHvrtab: Either 'click' (default) or 'hover' - hover doesn't work on mobile

innerIcon is set on child blocks (tp-accordion-inner), not parent (tp-accordion)
Gradient backgrounds require openBg: 1 and bgType: 'gradient' in titleActbgtype
Active border radius (titleActBradius) bottom should be 0 when content has top radius for seamless join
Toggle icons (tgiconColor) are separate from inner content icons (inIconColor)
defaultAct uses string index ('0', '1', '2') not numbers

responsiveStrategy.description: Accordion adapts to screen sizes using md (desktop), sm (tablet), xs (mobile) breakpoints
responsiveStrategy.recommendedApproach: Configure md first, then override sm/xs only where needed. Empty values inherit from md.
commonResponsivePatterns: Reduce title font size on mobile: titleTypo.size md: '18px' → xs: '15px'
Reduce padding on mobile: titlePadding md: 18px → sm: 14px → xs: 12px
Center expand/collapse button on mobile: collBtnAlign md: 'right' → xs: 'center'
Smaller toggle icons on mobile: tgiconSize md: '18px' → xs: '14px'
Reduce spacing between items on mobile: accorBetspace md: '12px' → xs: '6px'

accessibilityNotes: Use semantic heading tags (titleTag: 'h2', 'h3', 'h4') for proper document structure
Avoid onHvrtab: 'hover' - not accessible via keyboard navigation (use 'click' instead)
Ensure sufficient color contrast for title text (WCAG AA: 4.5:1 minimum)
Toggle icons should have clear visual state change (+ to -, chevron rotation)
Test keyboard navigation - users should be able to open/close accordions with Enter/Space
Provide clear, descriptive titles - screen readers announce these as buttons
Don't rely solely on color to indicate active state - use icons, borders, or both

parentChildRelationship.description: tp-accordion is the parent container, tp-accordion-inner are child items
parentChildRelationship.parentBlock: tpgb/tp-accordion - Controls overall accordion behavior and styling
parentChildRelationship.childBlock: tpgb/tp-accordion-inner - Individual accordion items with title and content
parentChildRelationship.relationship: Parent-child relationship is critical - accordion won't work without child blocks
parentAttributes: toggleIcon, iconName, ActiconName - Toggle icon settings (affects all children)
atOneOpen - Behavior for all children (only one open at a time)
expCollBtn - Expand/collapse all button (affects all children)
titleTypo, titleColor, titlePadding - Default styling for all child titles
descTypo, descColor, descPadding - Default styling for all child content
childAttributes: innerIcon, innericonName - Optional icon next to this specific item's title
contentType - Content type for this specific item
parentChildRelationship.workflow: 1. Create tp-accordion parent block with styling. 2. Add tp-accordion-inner child blocks for each item. 3. Configure title/desc in each child. 4. Optional: Add innerIcon to specific children.

howToSchemaGuidance.description: Using How-To schema for SEO and Google rich results

required_attributes.markupSch: Set to true to enable How-To schema
required_attributes.howTotitle: Main title of the how-to (e.g., 'How to Install WordPress')
required_attributes.howTodesc: Brief description of what the how-to accomplishes

howToSchemaGuidance.how_it_works: Each tp-accordion-inner child becomes a 'step' in the How-To schema with the title as the step name and desc as the step details
seo_benefits: Appears in Google rich results with enhanced visibility
Can show in Google's How-To carousel
May display step count and images in search results
best_practices: Use clear, actionable step titles (e.g., 'Step 1: Download WordPress')
Provide detailed step descriptions in desc field
Keep steps in logical order (first to last)
Use 3-10 steps for optimal results (too few or too many reduces effectiveness)
Test schema with Google's Rich Results Test tool
